alerts.header_text: Metro continues to operate its Emergency Snow Network (ESN). Service is significantly reduced. Visit the Metro Matters blog and MetroWInter.com for complete information.
alerts.short_header_text: Metro continues to operate its Emergency Snow Network (ESN). Service is significantly reduced. Visit MetroWinter.com.
alerts.description_text:
King County Metro continues to operate its Emergency Snow Network. 

The following routes operate during ESN:
RapidRide A Line
RapidRide B Line
RapidRide C Line
RapidRide D Line
RapidRide E Line
RapidRide F Line
3
4
5
7
10
21
24
31
32
36
40
44
45
48
60
62
65
67
70
75
101
102
105
106
120
124
128
131
132
148
150
160
161
165
168
181
184
230
231
239
245
250
255
271
331
345
348
372
ST 522
ST 545
ST 550
ST 554
773 - this route is suspended when the West Seattle Water Taxi is not in service.
775 - this route is suspended when the West Seattle Water Taxi is not in service.
DART 903
DART 906
DART 907 - this route will not operate on
DART 930

Visit the Metro Matters blog and MetroWInter.com for complete information.

Contact Customer Service at 206-553-3000, from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. through Dec. 30 for trip planning and Lost & Found calls, and from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. for ORCA, fare questions and customer comments.

NOTE: The Customer Service phone lines will also be open with limited staffing on Dec. 31 from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. for Trip Planning and ORCA assistance on the New Year's weekend. Customer comments can be submitted through online forms. 

Pass Sales Office and Lost & Found are operating reduced hours, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. through Dec. 30. For Lost & Found, customers can call Metro Customer Service at 206-553-3000. In-person service is by appointment only, so please call first.

NOTE: These offices will be closed on Friday, Dec. 31, in observance of the holiday.

Tips and tricks for riders 

Transit Alerts: Riders should sign?up?or update route subscriptions?to receive?Transit Alerts?via text and email?for?their?bus?routes. Routes can change quickly depending on snow accumulations.? 

Real-time updates show whether a bus trip is operating when it’s due to?depart or if it’s been canceled.? 

Text for Departures allows riders to text their bus stop number to 62550 and receive the next bus trips headed their way or a cancellation notice. Riders can save 62550 in their phones in advance.?Metro’s real-time departure information can become less accurate during a storm and rough road conditions. 

“Next departures”?is available?on both the?Puget Sound Trip Planner webpage?and the?Puget Sound Trip Planner App.?Riders can check these sites to see whether their trip is reporting its position and estimated arrival time. 

Follow?@kcmetrobus?on Twitter?to see the latest?travel tips and service information.

Thank you for riding and using Metro's services.
alerts.service_effect_text: DART 903 and 63 other routes is operating using the Emergency Snow Network (ESN).

alerts.header_text: The elevator at the Clyde Hill/Yarrow & Clyde Hill/Yarrow (EB) (#71359) stop is out of service until further notice.
alerts.short_header_text: The elev. at the Clyde Hill/Yarrow & Clyde Hill/Yarrow stop is out of service until further notice.
alerts.description_text:
Affected routes:
ST 542
ST 545
255

Get on/off buses at:
Sr 520 & Evergreen Point Rd (EB) (#71348) (to Redmond)

The elevator at the westbound Clyde Hill/Yarrow Point stop is operating. ST 542 and 545 riders, transfer to eastbound Route 255 at Evergreen Point Freeway Station and then transfer to a westbound bus at South Kirkland to return to Clyde Hill/Yarrow Point.

alerts.header_text:
Service on the South Lake Union Streetcar will be reduced today with trips operating approximately every 30 minutes until further notice. 

For alternate bus service, use Metro bus routes 40 or 70.

48
372

Stop #9650 11th Ave NE & NE 45th St (NB)

Temporary
Bus Stop Closure

Beginning Saturday, April 23, and until further notice, this bus stop will be closed due to construction.

At that time, board or exit routes 49 and 372 south and west of here, northbound on 11th Ave NE between NE 45th and NE 47th streets.

For transit information please contact Metro’s Customer Information Office at (206) 553-3000 or visit kingcounty.gov/metro.

alerts.header_text: Stop #11130 Pike St & Convention Pl (EB) revised beginning at 11:42 AM.
alerts.short_header_text: Stop #11130 Pike St & Convention Pl (EB) revised beginning at 11:42 AM.
alerts.description_text:
Affected routes:
ST 550
101
102
150

Routes 10 & 43 Service Revision

Effective immediately, routes 10 and 43 will no longer stop here.

At this time, board or exit routes 10 to Capitol Hill and 43 to U-District west of here, eastbound on Pike St just east of 7th Ave, (Stop #1195).

Routes 101, 102, 150 and ST 550 are unaffected by this change and will continue to drop off passengers here.

For more information: 
Visit www.kingcounty.gov/metro.
Pick up a new green timetable on the bus.
Text your stop ID to 62550 to find the next departure time.
